sharedContent.title:
The Russian film director Sergei Solovyov died today.

One of the best-known movies he made is ASSA (1987).

Two years ago, I wrote on @Quora about a very special and memorable scene from that movie.

https://t.co/eQiHqcdLtz
sharedContent.author: Amir {{💉💉💉💉}}. Aharoni

previous.title: What are three simple ways that companies can start to address the climate emergency in their business today? Bestselling author & founder/CEO of @WeFirstBranding, @simonmainwaring, shares his expert opinion. https://t.co/CDWoFiBC3B

localize.full_text: 今日、企業がビジネスにおいて気候変動の緊急事態に対処するために始められる3つの簡単な方法とは？ベストセラー作家であり、@WeFirstBrandingの創業者/CEOでもある@simonmainwaring氏が、専門家としての意見を述べています。https://t.co/CDWoFiBC3B
今天，企业可以通过哪三种简单的方式开始解决其业务中的气候紧急情况？畅销书作家& @WeFirstBranding的创始人/CEO, @simonmainwaring, 分享他的专业意见。https://t.co/CDWoFiBC3B
今天，企業可以通過哪三種簡單的方式開始解決其業務中的氣候緊急情況？暢銷書作家& @WeFirstBranding的創始人/CEO, @simonmainwaring, 分享他的專業意見。https://t.co/CDWoFiBC3B
